original_title: La Vie Des Noirs Dans Un Village Du Congo
overview: A short film screened Il Cinema Ritrovato 2021. The film demonstrates "the inability of most filmmakers to meet a foreign culture in an appropriate manner, while offering gorgeous cinematographic shots from African landscapes, an important raison d’être of the genre." (Karl Wratschko)
title: La Vie Des Noirs Dans Un Village Du Congo
